faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

deliveryTime.question: How long does delivery take?
deliveryTime.answer: Standard delivery takes 2-5 business days within Belgium. Express delivery is available for next-day delivery.

returnPolicy.question: What is your return policy?
returnPolicy.answer: You can return unused products within 30 days of purchase with original packaging and receipt.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, Apple Pay, and bank transfers.

installation.question: Do you offer tire installation?
installation.answer: Yes, we provide professional tire installation at our service center in Ledegem.

warranty.question: Do your tires come with warranty?
warranty.answer: All our tires come with manufacturer warranty. Warranty period varies by brand and product.

orderTracking.question: How can I track my order?
orderTracking.answer: You will receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. You can also track orders in your account.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.point1: We only collect information necessary to provide our services
overview.point2: Your data is never sold to third parties
overview.point3: You have full control over your personal information

personal.description: Information you provide directly to us

technical.examples: IP address, browser type, device information

usage.description: How you interact with our website
usage.examples: Pages visited, time spent, click patterns

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We collect information when you create an account, make a purchase, contact us, or use our website. This includes personal details like name and email, as well as technical information like your IP address and browser type.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to process orders, provide customer service, improve our website, send updates about your orders, and comply with legal requirements. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We only share your information with trusted service providers who help us operate our business, such as payment processors and shipping companies. These partners are bound by strict confidentiality agreements.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including SSL encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings in your browser. For more details, see our Cookie Policy.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or transfer your personal data. You can also object to processing or withdraw consent. Contact us to exercise these rights.

exercise.title: Exercise Your Rights
exercise.description: To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions governing the use of our website and services

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: By using our website and services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully before making any purchases.

acceptance.title: Agreement
acceptance.description: Using our services means you accept these terms

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Our liability is limited as described in these terms

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: In these terms, 'Company' refers to Ariana Banden Service, 'Services' refers to our tire sales and installation services, and 'User' refers to anyone using our website or services.

products.title: Products and Services
products.content: We sell tires, wheels, and automotive accessories. All products are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit quantities and discontinue products.

orders.title: Orders and Payment
orders.content: Orders are subject to acceptance and availability. Payment is required at time of order. We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content: Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location and product. Risk of loss transfers to you upon delivery. See our Shipping Policy for detailed information.

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content: Unused products may be returned within 30 days with original packaging. Installation services are non-refundable. See our Return Policy for complete details.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.content: Products come with manufacturer warranty. We provide warranty service in accordance with manufacturer terms. Warranty does not cover normal wear or misuse.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Our liability is limited to the purchase price of products. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: Website content, logos, and trademarks are our property or used with permission. You may not use our intellectual property without written consent.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree to use our website lawfully and not to engage in any activity that could harm our business or other users.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our services at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by Belgian law. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Belgium.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.mediation: We encourage resolving disputes through direct communication first.
dispute.arbitration: If direct resolution fails, disputes may be subject to arbitration.
dispute.jurisdiction: Any legal proceedings must be brought in Belgian courts.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide a better user experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.
what.usage: We use both session cookies (which expire when you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which remain on your device for a set period).

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality. These cannot be disabled.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences and settings for a better experience.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our website to improve performance.

ga.purpose: Tracks website usage and visitor behavior

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.description: You can control cookies through your browser settings or by using our cookie preference center above.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.description: Contact us if you have questions about our cookie usage

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.description: Our commitment to making our website accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to ensuring our website is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. We strive to meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards and continuously improve our accessibility features.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboard.description: Full website functionality available via keyboard

details.enter: Enter key activates buttons and links
details.escape: Escape key closes dialogs and menus
details.arrows: Arrow keys navigate menus and lists

visual.title: Visual Accessibility
visual.description: Design optimized for users with visual impairments

details.resize: Text can be resized up to 200%

audio.title: Audio Accessibility
audio.description: Audio content is accessible to users with hearing impairments

cognitive.title: Cognitive Accessibility
cognitive.description: Clear structure and navigation for all users

screenReaders.name: Screen Readers
screenReaders.description: Compatible with popular screen reading software

issues.title: Known Issues
issues.description: We are aware of the following accessibility issues and are working to resolve them:
issues.item1: Some third-party content may not meet full accessibility standards
issues.item2: Complex product filtering may be challenging for some assistive technologies

feedback.title: Accessibility Feedback
feedback.description: We welcome feedback about accessibility issues or suggestions for improvement.

support.title: Accessibility Support
support.description: If you need assistance accessing any part of our website, please contact us:

formats.title: Alternative Formats
formats.description: This accessibility statement is available in alternative formats upon request.
